body_content.explanation: an act of breaking (= not obeying) a code (= set of rules) that applies to a particular area of activity, sport, etc.:
examples: City and state housing inspectors uncovered numerous code violations and deficiencies in the buildings.
Under the Grand Slam rules in tennis, coaching during the match is prohibited and is a code violation.

body_content.explanation: (in tennis) a penalty (= punishment) that is given when someone commits a code violation:
examples: He received a code violation for hitting a ball way up into the stands when he missed a passing shot.
